function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mosquito-infested swamplands in post-WWI and Spanish Flu eras","Impact":"Increased risk of mosquito-borne diseases, such as malaria and dengue fever","Mitigation":"Implementing mosquito control measures, draining swamplands, and using insect repellents","Technologies":"Mosquito nets, insecticide sprays, and larvicide treatments","People":"Residents and workers in affected areas","Owner":"Local governments and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Disease-infested environments in densely populated urban areas","Impact":"Increased risk of disease outbreaks, including airborne and contact-transmitted diseases","Mitigation":"Improving urban planning, sanitation, and housing conditions, as well as implementing disease surveillance and control measures","Technologies":"Urban design and planning strategies, sanitation infrastructure, and disease monitoring technologies","People":"Residents, workers, and visitors in urban areas","Owner":"Urban planners, architects, public health authorities"}]}
